name: Clash of Captured Gladiator
description:
Clash of Captured Gladiator --> Is fighting game. 

You are a player gladiator and must beat your enemies, to reach to the next level. 

 - 3D game

 - 13 different scenes

- 3 different terrains

- 3 different arenas

 - 10 levels 

- 1 Player which is our character

- 10 different enemies

 - 3 different sound effects for player (When attack, getting hurt or when dies)

 - 30 different sound effects for enemies (When attack, getting hurt or when dies).

 One enemy have 3 different sound effects and if we count with 10 levels then is 30 different sound effects

 - 1 Sound effect when battle begins (Arenas harms)

 - 1 Sound effect when the battle is over (Loop of gong voices)

 - Automatic save game after level is completed

Keyboard : W, S, A, D - Moving

1 x E - For attack

2 x E - For attack

2 x Q - For attack

Escape - Quit

A lot of secrets and surprises in game... Soo a lot of enjoying...
